title: Blossom with Me
description: Charming, self-confident and cocky, I take life in my stride. I spend my days as a carpenter, my spare time in the mountains, and my evenings hunting for the next woman to share my bed. That is until I meet Emma. The curvy florist avoids all my advances. But I will fight for her because, deep inside, I know she is the one.
author: Dani Elias
